workout_groups.name: Ground Fighting Fundamentals
workout_groups.description: Grappling with weighted resistance, roll recovery.

workouts.name: Basic Grappling
workouts.description: Practice basic grappling techniques.

workouts.name: Weighted Resistance Drills
workouts.description: Practice grappling with weighted resistance.

workouts.name: Roll Recovery
workouts.description: Practice roll recovery techniques.

workouts.name: Grappling with Sparring
workouts.description: Practice grappling with sparring.

workouts.name: Grappling with Sparring and Weighted Resistance
workouts.description: Practice grappling with sparring and weighted resistance.

workouts.name: Weighted Vest Grappling with Sparring and Weighted Resistance
workouts.description: Practice weighted vest grappling with sparring and weighted resistance.

workouts.name: Grappling with Blindfold
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while blindfolded to enhance spatial awareness.

workouts.name: Grappling with One Arm
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques using only one arm to improve adaptability.

workouts.name: Grappling with Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques with resistance bands to build strength.

workouts.name: Grappling with Partner Switching
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques with frequent partner switching to improve versatility.

workouts.name: Grappling with Obstacle Course
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while navigating an obstacle course to enhance agility.

workouts.name: Grappling with Weighted Vest
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while wearing a weighted vest to increase endurance.

workouts.name: Grappling with Sandbags
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques with sandbags to simulate real-life resistance.

workouts.name: Grappling with Multiple Opponents
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques against multiple opponents to improve defensive skills.

workouts.name: Grappling with Limited Vision
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques with limited vision to enhance reaction time.

workouts.name: Grappling with Tactical Gear
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while wearing tactical gear to simulate real-world scenarios.

workouts.name: Grappling with Weighted Vest and Blindfold
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while wearing a weighted vest and blindfolded to enhance spatial awareness and strength.

workouts.name: Grappling with Multiple Opponents and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques against multiple opponents with resistance bands to improve defensive skills and strength.

workouts.name: Grappling with Tactical Gear and Weighted Vest
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while wearing tactical gear and a weighted vest to simulate real-world scenarios.

workouts.name: Grappling with Limited Vision and Multiple Opponents
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques with limited vision against multiple opponents to enhance reaction time and defensive skills.

workouts.name: Grappling with Obstacle Course and Weighted Vest
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while navigating an obstacle course and wearing a weighted vest to enhance agility and endurance.

workouts.name: Grappling with Sandbags and Blindfold
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques with sandbags while blindfolded to simulate real-life resistance and enhance spatial awareness.

workouts.name: Grappling with Tactical Gear and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques while wearing tactical gear and using resistance bands to simulate real-world scenarios and build strength.

workouts.name: Grappling with Multiple Opponents and Tactical Gear
workouts.description: Practice grappling techniques against multiple opponents while wearing tactical gear to improve defensive skills and simulate real-world scenarios.
